attributes.action: stop giving discounts to people who don't work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are so many people on the dole at the moment partly due to the amount of money unemployed people get.they live in luxury,have things paid for them and have discounts to get into places.why should the working man have to pay for them.if they say they can't get a job-they should have payed more attention at school and worked harder shouldn't they?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
